One era ends, and another begins for late-night TV's longest-serving host.

articles.title: 'MasterChef Junior' contestant Ben Watkins dies of cancer at 14 - NBC News
articles.description: “MasterChef Junior” contestant Ben Watkins died of cancer on Monday at the Lurie Children’s Hospital of Chicago. He was 14.
articles.content:
